title: Added support for Event Handling
body:
TP can invoke addEvent method to create a custom
event based on business requirement. The arguments
to be passed should include 'event_type', 'attributes',
'event_data'

Signed-off-by: raghav.aneja <raghav.aneja@intel.com>

title: Set message type for invalid transaction
body:
To communicate the rejection reason thrown by the TP,
the 'message' attribute of Invalid Transaction Exception
is populated along with the 'transaction_id'

Signed-off-by: raghav.aneja <raghav.aneja@intel.com>

title: Update Jenkinsfile to schedule a build at 3AM CST
Fix path to whitelist script in Jenkinsfile
Allow TP to get serialized txn header
body:
RFC text/0000-raw-txn-header.md describes in brief the need to
have serialized transaction header sent to transaction processor.
1. Introduce required proto changes, set EXPANDED as default.
2. Introduces a new method for setting transaction header style.

Please refer to hyperledger/sawtooth-rfcs#23 for detailed
description.

Minor: Add .project (IDE created folder) to gitignore

title: Add license as indicated by the Fossology scan
body:
Detailed fossology report in STL-398

Signed-off-by: kulkarniamol <amol.kulkarni@intel.com>

title: Fix Regression from Using Reserved Word Namespace
Fix Incorrect Comment about CheckIfValidNamespace
body:
s/Checks if an address string/Checks if a namespace string/
